label: Seminar for Advanced Students
description: Seminar in the education of individuals with special needs; open only to persons who have been admitted for graduate study. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. Approved for letter and S/U grading.
courseSectionInformation: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. Approved for letter and S/U grading.
classScheduleInformation: Some sections may require additional course fees.
sectionFeeAmount: SPED Class Materials Fee $15.00 Flat Fee.
